description: Dispatched when a body part is detached from its parent anatomy

detachedEntityId.description: The entity ID of the detached body part

parentEntityId.description: The entity ID of the parent it was detached from

socketId.description: The socket ID where the part was attached

detachedCount.description: Total number of entities detached (including sub-parts)

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the detachment occurred
